description: two drawings on one sheet of paper, each outlined with black borders and with Roman numerals I and III at the lower right margin of each drawing; drawing on the left side of the sheet is of a figure dressed in black in the center of the image running with arms extended above his head; drawing on the right of the sheet is of a woman in the upper left corner looking out from an opening in a black wall toward a standing figure facing her on the right side of the image; drawings are studies for plates 1 and 3 of Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack
inscription: LLC of sheet in red pencil, on verso: 101
title: Sketches for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
